document.full_text: the author, a senior at a public high school in denver, thought m.i.t.'s decision to release its admission letters on pi day was "cute,'' until she read the decision. other news, though, was more favorable.
document.title: 'i am in. i am going to college'
lines_and_colors: the author, a senior at a public high school in denver, thought m.i.t.'s decision to release its admission letters on pi day was "cute,'' until she read the decision. other news, though, was more favorable.
